entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Subsequent hostedServices are not getting started with StartAsync #78135
  • [.Net7] Json deserialization regression: The value of the '$id' metadata property '93' conflicts with an existing identifier. Path: $... | LineNumber: ... | BytePositionInLine: .... #78132
  • The frame times of my toy ray tracer increased from 24ms to 30ms #78127
  • [API Proposal]: DiagnosticListener support for testing #78125
  • crossgen2's `--compilebubblegenerics` causes live lock at app start (100% CPU usage) #78117
  • NativeAOT compiler assert on static abstract GVM #78116
  • "SYSLIB1045 Use GeneratedRegexAttribute" doesn't respect #ifdef regions #78115
    8.0.0
  • SYSLIB1045 Use GeneratedRegexAttribute replaces verbatim string with regular string #78113
  • Change Event Viewer Log Level Mapping for Debug and/or Trace #78112
  • Performance of my Maze Generator went from 2.1 seconds to 3.8 after upgrading to .NET 7.0 #78110
  • Docker Container: running c# on linux arm32 #78108
  • Host.CreateDefaultBuilder watch the program root directory #78100
  • S.T.J.JsonSerializer doesn't support properties marked with JsonRequiredAttribute that're initialized through ctor #78098
  • QuicListener AcceptConnectionAsync and OperationCanceledException #78096
  • Uri.IdnHost strange behaviour for long hosts #78094
  • Spurious AV in unoptimized prolog #78092
    8.0.0
  • Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject throws a TypeLoadException if the parameter has a covariant property. #78090
  • .net 7 cycles Performance slow #78089
  • ExecutionEngineException when hooking/detouring GetSysColor() #78086
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\0044\\nullable\\nullable.cmd #78083
    8.0.0
  • JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Fma_Vector256.Program.MultiplyAddSingle fails in consolidated Vector test on OSX #78079
    8.0.0
  • Autogenerated assembly version is set to false for ILLink #78076
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] Unify implementation of Weak References in all runtimes. #75587
    8.0.0
  • Feature Request: Auto-Vectorization #77617
  • [jitstress] nullref in DefaultMode_Missing_AllMethods_ReportsDiagnostic #77153
    8.0.0
  • Assembly resolution algorithm difference between .NET 6 and .NET 4.8 #78037
  • Tar: symbolic link targets outside extract dir #74140
    8.0.0
  • .Net 7 System.Text.Json: Deserialize<EcohomeSettings> throws "Deserialization of types without a parameterless constructor not supported" exception #78111
  • System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager package contains assemblies with inconsistent versions #77887
  • System.Text.Json throws ArgumentNullException and not JsonException when deserializing with missing required property if exception resources are stripped #78099
  • System.Management throw System.PlatformNotSupportedException: 'System.Management currently is only supported for Windows desktop applications.' #78104
  • "unmanaged memory" issue with dotnet 6 #77722
  • .net7 JSON serialization performance regression #78097
  • Source Genereate Error not provided by TypeInfoResolver of type 'MyJsonContext'. If using source generation, ensure that all root types passed to the serializer have been indicated with 'JsonSerializableAttribute', along with any types that might be serialized polymorphically. #77115
  • [jitstress-random] Assertion failed '((lclNode->gtFlags & GTF_VAR_DEF) != 0) && (((lclNode->gtFlags & GTF_VAR_USEASG) != 0) == !isFullDef)' #77975
  • Sporadic OpenSSL decryption fails for HttpClient responses #73610
    6.0.x
  • System.Net.Security.Tests.NegotiateAuthenticationKerberosTest asserts on Android #74708
    8.0.0
  • ServerNoEncryption_ClientRequireEncryption_NoConnect passes on Ubuntu 22.04 with message about error:0A0000C1:SSL routines::no shared cipher #74970
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Directed/nullabletypes/Desktop/boxunboxvaluetype_ro/boxunboxvaluetype_ro.sh #77661
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: ObjectDisposedException in System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.JSImportExportTest.JsImportTaskTypes #78017
    8.0.0
  • s390x: XxHash3Tests.Hash_OneShot_Expected and Hash_Streaming_Expected tests fail #78043
    8.0.0
  • GetAllNetworkInterfaces throws on Success on Android .NET 6 #77938
    6.0.x
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/Vector128/Vector128_ro/Vector128_ro.sh #78082
  • net7.0 `System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonWriter#WriteBase64String` requires `RefStructs` compiler feature VB.NET #78065
  • Long running test: SendMailAsync_CanBeCanceled_CancellationToken #73447
    7.0.0
  • JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Fma_Vector256.Program.MultiplyAddSingle fails in consolidated Vector test on OSX #78081
  • JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Fma_Vector256.Program.MultiplyAddSingle fails in consolidated Vector test on OSX #78080
  • VC++ debug errors in mscordaccore on main #78019
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Azure Pipelines build badge in README #78134
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Add Vector128.AndNot intrinsics #78133
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 8.0.0
  • Transform `STRUCT`-typed uses of primitives in local morph #78131
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix expensive typo in JsonNode #78130
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Bring back fabricbot changes #78129
    area-Meta
  • Add REAMDE.md for ServiceProcess.ServiceController #78124
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • [release/7.0] Fix Binding with IList<>, ICollection and IDictionary<,> implementer types #78118
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [release/7.0] JIT: fix gc hole in peephole optimizations #78109
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Restrict named mutex files permissions #78106
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix a typo. #78105
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix non-determinism in Regex source generator #78103
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add IndexOfAnyValues #78093
    area-System.Memory, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Fix support for generic custom attributes. #78091
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use TaskDialog for error dialog in Windows GUI apps #78087
    area-Host
  • Fix wrong condition check #78085
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `AppDomainIterator` #78078
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Linker into runtime2 #78077
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Bump consumed dependency of Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility #78119
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #78051
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Linker into runtime diff2 #78049
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Split and simplify `fgMorphOneAsgBlockOp` #76793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: fix gc hole in peephole optimizations #78074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages (backport of #75597) #77509
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Don't generate a nearly empty file #77187
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.x
  • Revert changes to fabricbot.json #78126
    area-Meta
  • Add README.md for System.Drawing.Primitives #78123
    area-System.Drawing
  • Add README.md for System.Drawing.Common #78121
    area-System.Drawing
  • Fixed clang15 build issues #78102
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-ppc64le
  • Update area tizen owners #78095
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Upgrade dotnet version needed to build benchmarks in superpmi #78088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #78057
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Fix Configuration with IList and ICollection #77857
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Update framework to net8.0 for perf-job. #78012
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Implement Vector128.Abs intrinsics #78067
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix XxHash3 DeriveSecretFromSeed scalar fallback on big endian #78084
    area-System.IO
  • Fix build error due to unused windowSize parameter in pal_console.c #78056
    area-System.Console, 8.0.0
  • Sync linker to NativeAOT #77894
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Exclude unnecessary functions/fields when FEATURE_METADATA_EMIT_IN_DEBUGGER #78058
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Pass NodeFactory to ObjectData's Section #77967
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update `GTF_VAR_USEASG` in the GS transformation #78028
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [main] Disable NativeAOT subset for source-build. (#76206) #78060
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix an issue with Vector<T>.Multiply #78021
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Use forattributename jsgenerator #78136
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Change regMask_enum and regMaskTP to unsigned __int64_t on AMD64. #77571
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Allocate boxed static structs on Frozen Object Heap #77737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Make Frozen collections tests pass with NativeAOT #78005
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reduce host memory usage: don't keep resolved deps around for app lifetime #77987
    area-Host, 8.0.0
  • Fix relative symlink support in TarFile #77338
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] TAR: Trim file type bits from mode header #77612
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 7.0.1
  • [JIT] X64 - Minor optimizations for arithmetic and `not` / `neg` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification #77386
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add a VN-based dead store removal phase #77990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete a bit more `OBJ(ADDR(...))` wrapping from `impNormStructVal` #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Return NULL for mmap fail case on Unix #78069
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Suppress warnings for deprecated keychain APIs #77926
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, 6.0.x
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, test-enhancement
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix CngKey.KeySize for keys in the Platform Crypto Provider #77809
    area-System.Security
  • Adds readme for more extension items #77865
    area-Meta
  • [mono] MiniJIT OP_XEQUAL for floats #77770
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes, do_jit_call, and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #77794
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Subject src-gen serializer to full number-handling tests #78010
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Fix EC curve name case sensitivity on Windows #77801
    area-System.Security
  • WIP: Clean near unmaintainable parallel logic 53593 #76949
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Cleanup unmaintainable parallel logic with workers #77993
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Clean-up `Microsoft.Win32.Registry` and remove the non-Windows code. #77996
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Updating CreateScalar to be intrinsic for Vector64/128/256 #77798
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for CV path. #78044
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Normalize SIMD comparisons #78027
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Lazy init of [JSExport] bindings #77293
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    arch-arm64, os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix a few recent perf regressions in Regex #78003
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Prefer OutputRid over PackageRID for output artifacts. #76871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Don't copy coreclr version of coreclr and SPCL to core_root when targeting mono #76890
    area-Infrastructure
  • `ComputeManagedAssembliesToCompileToNative`: Make `microsoft.netcore.app` check case-insensitive. #78022
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use `init-os-and-arch.sh` in mono samples recipes #78055
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Enable software writewatch and card bundles on Windows. #77934
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior; Make the Utf8JsonWriter always insert newlines between the end of comments and the start of arrays or objects #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • Introduce OptLevel() in jit #77465
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
